Name: Name Change, Frank LoCicero Bellerose-Hillside Civic Garden, Queens.
Title: A Local Law in relation to a traffic island name, Frank LoCicero Bellerose - Hillside Civic Garden, Borough of Queens.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      Section 1.  The following traffic island name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
      New name			Present name			Limits
_________________________________________________________________

Frank LoCicero Bellerose-	None			entire traffic
Hillside Civic Garden					island on Hillside Avenue and the Cross Island Parkway Service Road South

      
      

      
      

      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
